thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 25 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Maruti Suzuki India Dec Qtr Profit Up 3 Pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Maruti Suzuki India Dec Qtr Profit Up 3 Pct
text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - Maruti Suzuki India Ltd:
* CONSENSUS FORECAST FOR DEC QUARTER NET PROFIT WAS 20.36 BILLION RUPEES
* DEC QUARTER PROFIT 17.99 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT OF 17.47 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC QUARTER TOTAL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 192.83 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 191.97 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* APPROVED REVISION IN METHOD OF CALCULATING ROYALTY WHICH WOULD RESULT IN LOWER ROYALTY PAYMENTS FOR NEW MODEL DEALS Source text - bit.ly/2DLjAMn Further company coverage:
